name.japanese: ガレーラカンパニー第1ドック

description: The primary shipbuilding dock of the Galley-La Company in Water 7, Dock #1 is a massive facility where the finest ships in the world are constructed. It features state-of-the-art shipbuilding equipment, dry docks, and workshops staffed by master shipwrights.

keyEvents.title: Tour of Dock #1
keyEvents.description: Kalifa guides Luffy, Nami, and Usopp through the impressive facilities of Dock #1, showcasing the scale and capabilities of Galley-La Company's main shipbuilding facility.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the primary location for the early Water 7 arc events and establishes the prestige of Galley-La Company.

keyEvents.title: Paulie's Debut at Dock #1
keyEvents.description: Paulie demonstrates his rope techniques at Dock #1 while being chased by debt collectors, establishing him as one of the skilled foremen working at the facility.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the kind of talent employed at Dock #1 and introduces a key ally.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Mugged at Dock #1
keyEvents.description: The Franky Family attacks Usopp while he watches craftsmen work at Dock #1, stealing the Straw Hats' money.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the critical theft occurs that triggers the Water 7 arc's main conflict.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry's Death Sentence
keyEvents.description: At Dock #1, Kaku delivers the devastating diagnosis that the Going Merry is beyond repair, a turning point in the arc.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the Straw Hats learn they must say goodbye to their beloved ship.

statusHistory.reason: Dock #1 is operational as Galley-La Company's primary shipbuilding facility

description: Water 7 is a city built on water, famous worldwide as the premier location for shipbuilding. The city is built on multiple levels connected by waterways, with Galley-La Company as its major economic force. Iceburg serves as both company president and city mayor.

keyEvents.title: Exploring Water 7's Shipyard
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats continue exploring Water 7, specifically visiting the famous Dock #1 of Galley-La Company.
keyEvents.significance: Shows more of Water 7's shipbuilding culture and infrastructure.

statusHistory.reason: Water 7 is a thriving shipbuilding city
